pages.text: Detailed here are the ores found within the $(thing)Aether$(), including whether they're affected by Fortune or Silk Touch, and any special behaviours and requirements for processing them.

pages.title: Ambrosium
pages.text: A soft, energy rich material, sometimes called the food of the gods. Has important uses as a fuel for the $(item)Enchanting Altar$() and in making torches. Can also be directly consumed to heal your wounds.$(br2)Silk Touch: True$(br2)Fortune: True

pages.title: Zanite
pages.text: An uncommon purple gemstone. Tools and weapons made from this become sharper as they wear down, respectively increasing their harvest speed and damage proportionally.$(br2)Silk Touch: True$(br2)Fortune: True

pages.title: Gravitite
pages.text: A rarer material, $(item)Gravitite$() is believed to be what keeps the islands of the $(thing)Aether$() suspended in the sky. The ore and blocks of this material will float upwards if unobstructed.$(br2)Requires an $(item)Enchanting Altar$() to process.$(br)Silk Touch: True$(br)Fortune: True
